# Histograma
Los histogramas se los utiliza comÃºnmente para visualizar la forma en se distribuyen los datos.

## Librerias necesarias

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(gcookbook)
library(reticulate)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
```

## Histograma en R

```{r, out.width="50%", out.height="50%", fig.align='center'}

cars %>% ggplot(aes(x=dist)) + 
    geom_histogram()

```

## Hisograma en Python

```{python, out.width="50%", out.height="50%", fig.align='center'}
plt.clf()

x=np.array(r.cars["dist"])

plt.hist(x)
plt.show()
```
